cambridge-ceu

About

This repository contains software/documents created at the CEU. A full list of these is available from https://github.com/cambridge-ceu or the GitHub menu button.

The topics cover but are not limited to multi-omics analysis.

Technical notes

Our beloved is an offspring of the great figure at https://tinyurl.com/temf27hm.

This is the base jekyll theme as documented at jekyllrb.com, Github Pages and official docs.

The source code for Jekyll is at GitHub: jekyll / jekyll.

The source code for minima is at GitHub: jekyll / minima, e.g., gh-pages-minima-starter and minima-reboot.

The YouTube icon is thankfully from https://icons8.com/icons/set/youtube.
